column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou is very generous with his ingredients and even Mr. Creasote himself couldn't eat more than three slices of this. The cheese layer was at least a quarter inch thick and when you lifted a slice out of the box
column2: it would raise up more than 24" and still have molten cheese connected to the remainder in the box! For the sausage is almost like they covered the whole surface with a big sausage patty!
